div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1517 Jdita, near anc. Chalcis, Coelesyria, (512) 1894 Burial: late 4th cent. B.C. (Schlumberger) Contents: c. 400 AR Alexander III: c. 200 lifetime or early post. tetradr. (mostly Ace) Sidon: c. 200 double-shekels Disposition: dispersed Rouvier, RN 1902, pp. 255-6 Schlumberger, L'argent grec, p. 9, no. 18 Naster, INCJ, pp. 5, 10
